review: Friendly atmosphere with superb service. Dr. Neva demonstrated great expertise and was  gentle and friendly during the whole procedure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Neha is excellent with children! She makes sure they are comfortable at every stage. My son didn't realise he was getting an injection or the forceps were being used because she distracted him throughout. The process was clean, comfortable and reassuring. The clinic is easily reachable off the Eastern Ex Highway. Highly recommend her for kids and adults looking for general dentistry solutions.

tags: None
review: It was a really good experience. We learnt many new things about studying in abroad which we are unaware of. Dr Neha and Dr Varun are really humble and they answer all your queries helping you to take decisions about your future studies. I would surely suggest CODE for all students who have sincere doubts about dental studies abroad.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** **** ****** ** ************* *  compassionate about her job. She treats patients with care & concern for the patients. Her hands work dexterously on her patients' teeth. She is trained in the US & has acquired special skills that are scarce even in a place like Mumbai.
 
I find her work to be hugely effective in solving dental problems of her patients..

review: Doctor had a friendly approach. She made me realise the effects of my problems i.e. night grinding my teeth in sleep.... And yes of course a solution to it.
